### Want to learn about data analysis for language research?

For resources on research methods in linguistics, check out the [Study design](./study-design/), [Measures](./measures/) and [Data analysis](./analysis/) pages. For more general research skills and software, check the [Skills](./skills/) and [Software](./software/) pages. To know which courses in research methods/data analysis are offered to LEL students, see the [Courses](./courses/) page.

### Need help with quantitative data analysis and statistics?

If you need help with quantitative data analysis or statistical aspects of your research or dissertation, please find the available support channels on the [Support](./support/) page.
